summary: This module defines a Permission entity that models an authorization rule within Feast. It specifies which actions are allowed on particular resources, optionally constrained by resource type, name patterns, and required tags, and ties the rule to a validation policy. Helper utilities are provided for interpreting permission type information.
business_intent: To supply a structured representation of access‑control rules so that Feast can evaluate and enforce fine‑grained permissions based on actions, resources, and associated policies.
